channel.title: [PI] Changing Drop Rates
channel.description:
I want to lower the chances of getting rune from hellhounds. Here's my code in NPCDrops.TSM:
[code]#Hellhound 49:40 995:30000 565:60 554:60 1079:1 1093:1 1127:1 1432:1 1333:1 1185:1 2366:1 1249:1 4585:1 989:1[/code]
